name: NYC Car Service
description:
Nicole is starting her own automobile service company and she needs your help! Help Nicole run her business at NYC Car Service Station!

Serve customers according to their needs--wash, repair, gas cars and more-- reach the level goal before the timer runs out. Earn enough cash to buy new car services, develop vacant lots into buildings and take New York Car Service Station to a whole new level!

Game Features:
-Addictive gameplay, there's always something to do!
-Tons of unlockable car services!
-Challenging levels!
-High quality graphics!
-Fun time-management game!

966648405d
